title: Please help identify this font
content:
Hello,

Could someone please help me identify this font? My apologies for the poor quality of the image but it's the best I could find. The grey around the letters isn't part of the font just a distortion caused by me trying to increase the contrast to show it better. It is a solid, serifs font. I looks a little bit like "Incised 901" fonts but this font has Serifs while Incised does not.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks  
Emma

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Unknown Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106075144/http:/typophile.com/files/Unknown%20Font_0.jpg) | 29.71 KB |
author: emmaringo

comments.content:
It must be **[ITC Quorum (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106075144/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Quorum%20-%20Medium&fid=003d52498431a45b978f9ee39116fe37&fstyle=bi&fsize=48&text=The%20mighty%20Lion-O%20faces%20his%20evil%20enemy%20Hammerhand%20in%20this%20exciting%20episode&wrap=2)** emboldened and manually slanted.

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106075144/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
